summary: Add a submenu for tags commands
name: tagsubmenu
description: Adds a small submenu to the Tools menu of gvim. The menu options allow you to jump to tags and run the different tagselect commands without having to remember all the different key sequences. The keyboard shortcuts are shown on the menu, so this plugin is also useful while you are learning the vim tag commands.
install_details: Copy tagsubmenu.vim into your favorite plugin directory, or source it from your .vimrc file.

versions.release_notes: Added a menu option to search for tags that match a regular expression
